title: Bo Bo Xiongmao Ji Ji Hu
synopsis: When the planet was about to be destroyed, the superman panda patriarch instilled all his life-long knowledge and abilities into the little panda Bobo, and sent Bobo out of the planet about to explode. The spacecraft carrying the panda Bobo flew to the earth and landed in the beautiful and magical stone town. Here, Bobo and Tiger Gigi became good friends and met many friends in Stone Town. Bobo lives happily in the new home of the earth, and is very enthusiastic to use his superpowers and extensive knowledge to help everyone, but he often self-defenses, making people dumbfounded. (translated from iqiyi)
